title: If This Was JUDGMENT DAY . . .
body_text:
MAYDAY Results: Lima vs. Stopa!
One rookie looking to make a name for herself. One legend attempting to stay atop the ranks.
MATCH SUMMARY
Lima received first pick by way of winning the pre-match coin toss and wisely chose arguably 2011's most dangerous combatant Kevin Fitzpatrick. The crazed animal Justin Wolf would soon be drafted to the Stopa squad and before long, the leading ladies and their powerful armies remorselessly hurled weapons for an agonizing three-hour duration.
Some noteworthy stars and occurrences included Sascha Basista's impactful throws on the Lima defense line. A returning Zach Katz was also instrumental in the Stopa-lead journey to triumph. The Fitzpatrick/Londono-Wolf and Pierce-Adams battles were easily heard and felt by all competitors as well.
In the end, legendary titan Stopa bested fierce upstart Lima at MAYDAY. Eight total rounds were closely contested throughout, with the "UnStopable One" snagging six to claim the hard-fought victory.
Lauren Stopa
defeated
Joanice Lima
, 6 - 2.
The Stopa-Lima confrontation both reignited unforgettable rivalries of yesteryear
and
, perhaps more importantly, signified the coming of some hungry, fearless warriors ready to dethrone the hierarchy of dodgeball royalty. Which other legends will soon be tested? Who has the brass to step up to the plate?
ECD
will march forth to bring about the most captivating and thrilling action possible.
RECORDS
Attendance
: 18, comprised of 13 men and 5 women
New Dodgeballers
: 0
→ This was the first time within the second
Tronolone Era
* that there was not at least one new participant.
*(July 2010 - Present)
Game Rules
: Classic two-team.
Featured Match
: Lauren Stopa defeated Joanice Lima, 6 - 2.
Game-By-Game Results
: Stopa 1, 3-5, 7, 8; Lima 2, 6.
Captains Records
: Stopa 2-3-1; Lima 0-1-0
→ Stopa's victory was her very first one-on-one match win.
→ Lima became the 79th recorded captain in
EastCoastDodgeball
history.
Musical Playlist
: Kevin Fitzpatrick
Other Note
: MAYDAY was "Wet War XXXV" (35) and the first since December 2008.
________________________________________
________________________________________
___
It's the all-inclusive, annual tradition that defines
EastCoastDodgeball
.
Welcome to the
2011
Family Affair
spectacular.
Your presence would be greatly appreciated.
body_html:
MAYDAY Results: Lima vs. Stopa!
One rookie looking to make a name for herself. One legend attempting to stay atop the ranks.

MATCH SUMMARY
Lima received first pick by way of winning the pre-match coin toss and wisely chose arguably 2011's most dangerous combatant Kevin Fitzpatrick. The crazed animal Justin Wolf would soon be drafted to the Stopa squad and before long, the leading ladies and their powerful armies remorselessly hurled weapons for an agonizing three-hour duration.

Some noteworthy stars and occurrences included Sascha Basista's impactful throws on the Lima defense line. A returning Zach Katz was also instrumental in the Stopa-lead journey to triumph. The Fitzpatrick/Londono-Wolf and Pierce-Adams battles were easily heard and felt by all competitors as well.

In the end, legendary titan Stopa bested fierce upstart Lima at MAYDAY. Eight total rounds were closely contested throughout, with the "UnStopable One" snagging six to claim the hard-fought victory.

Lauren Stopa defeated Joanice Lima, 6 - 2.

The Stopa-Lima confrontation both reignited unforgettable rivalries of yesteryear and, perhaps more importantly, signified the coming of some hungry, fearless warriors ready to dethrone the hierarchy of dodgeball royalty. Which other legends will soon be tested? Who has the brass to step up to the plate? ECD will march forth to bring about the most captivating and thrilling action possible.

RECORDS
Attendance: 18, comprised of 13 men and 5 women
New Dodgeballers: 0
→ This was the first time within the second Tronolone Era* that there was not at least one new participant.
*(July 2010 - Present)

Game Rules: Classic two-team.
Featured Match: Lauren Stopa defeated Joanice Lima, 6 - 2.
Game-By-Game Results: Stopa 1, 3-5, 7, 8; Lima 2, 6.
Captains Records: Stopa 2-3-1; Lima 0-1-0
→ Stopa's victory was her very first one-on-one match win.
→ Lima became the 79th recorded captain in EastCoastDodgeball history.

Musical Playlist: Kevin Fitzpatrick
Other Note: MAYDAY was "Wet War XXXV" (35) and the first since December 2008.

___________________________________________________________________________________


It's the all-inclusive, annual tradition that defines EastCoastDodgeball.
Welcome to the 2011 Family Affair spectacular.



Your presence would be greatly appreciated.
